# Cybersecurity Web Testing Tool - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains a Python-based cybersecurity web testing tool for ethical penetration testing and security assessment.

## Project Guidelines

### Security and Ethics
- All tools are for authorized testing only
- Include proper disclaimers and usage warnings
- Focus on educational and defensive security purposes
- Implement rate limiting and responsible disclosure features

### Code Structure
- Modular design with separate scanner modules
- Comprehensive logging and reporting capabilities
- Configuration-driven approach for flexibility
- Error handling and graceful degradation

### Testing Approach
- Unit tests for all core functionality
- Integration tests with mock targets
- Performance testing for scalability
- Security testing of the tool itself

## Development Rules
- Use type hints for all Python code
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Document all modules and functions
- Include usage examples and CLI help
